message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $90 is a bit high for me, though. I'd be willing to pay $85. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $85 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $87.50.
